summary: High quality textures for sun and clouds.
descriptionHtml:
THE ELDER SCROLL V 

S K Y R I M


Sun & Clouds Textures
=====================

Installation
------------
Extract the content of the \"textures\" folder into the \"Data\" folder. If you have previous versions installed, just replace all files with the new ones.

The new textures are : 
Data\\Textures\\sky\\skyrimclouds01.dds
Data\\Textures\\sky\\skyrimcloudslower01.dds
Data\\Textures\\sky\\skyrimcloudslower02.dds
Data\\Textures\\sky\\skyrimcloudslower03.dds
Data\\Textures\\sky\\skyrimcloudslower04.dds
Data\\Textures\\sky\\skyrimcloudsmap01.dds
Data\\Textures\\sky\\skyrimcloudsupper01.dds
Data\\Textures\\sky\\skyrimcloudsupper02.dds
Data\\Textures\\sky\\skyrimcloudsupper03.dds
Data\\Textures\\sky\\skyrimcloudsupper04.dds
Data\\Textures\\sky\\sunglare.dds

Usage
-----
Do as you please.

:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
author: canguilhem
